**********************
XF Security Library
**********************

XF Security Library is an Vitis library for accelerating security applications.
Currently it is a pure FPGA-side library, with software API planned for future release.


.. toctree::
   :caption: Library Overview
   :maxdepth: 1

   overview.rst
   release.rst

.. toctree::
   :caption: User Guide
   :maxdepth: 2

   guide_L1/hw_guide.rst

.. toctree::
   :caption: Benchmark Result
   :maxdepth: 1

   benchmark/result.rst
